basic.blooming: Foliage plants, viewing period year around
basic.color: Leaf color green in the upper surface, lower surface green

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, grows with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry , may spray water on the leaves in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Resistant to pruning, remove dead and rotten leaves timely
